description:
Just like you, these pants were made for trekking and climbing. The optimized fit features a high waist for comfort under a backpack strap and coverage when you bend. Generous vents at the thighs and calves offer great breathability when you work up a sweat. Articulated knees and stretch-panel construction lend themselves to movement in the mountains, so if something were going to hold you back, it certainly wouldn’t be your pants.

  • Zippered vents at the thighs and calves help keep you cool
  • Stretchy panels help the pants move with you
  • Hardwearing G-1000® reinforcement where it's needed most
  • Paneled construction reduces hot spots
  • 4 pockets help keep necessities close, while 1 internal zippered pocket keeps things safe
  • Articulated knees let the pants move with you
  • Adjustable cuffs have boot hooks to keep your pants in place
  • Curved fit is designed to fit curvy figures with a more generous fit in the butt and thighs and a higher waist that won't gape or bunch
name: Fjallraven Keb Curved Trousers - Women's
